title: How to Make Pumpkin Pecan Pie

steps.headline: Warm up your baking sheet.
steps.description: Preheat the baking sheet in the oven, so that you can place the pie on the cookie sheet to bake.

steps.headline: Mix the ingredients.
steps.description: In a large bowl, mix one egg, pumpkin, 1/3 cup sugar, cinnamon, ginger, cloves, and salt.

steps.headline: Spread into the pie crust.
steps.description: Use a rubber spatula to spread on the pie crust.

steps.headline: Beat the eggs.
steps.description: In another bowl, beat the remaining eggs slightly.

steps.headline: Add in the rest of the wet ingredients.
steps.description: Stir in the corn syrup, 2/3 cup sugar, butter, and vanilla. Stir it until well blended.

steps.headline: Stir in the pecans.
steps.description: Add the pecans and carefully spoon on top of the pumpkin mixture.

steps.headline: Bake.
steps.description: Bake 50 to 60 minutes or until filling is set around edge.

steps.headline: Allow the pie to cool completely on a wire rack.
steps.description: Depending on the ambient temperature, this could be up to 5 hours. Enjoy!

text: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees/fahrenheit.  Warm up your baking sheet. Preheat the baking sheet in the oven, so that you can place the pie on the cookie sheet to bake. Mix the ingredients. In a large bowl, mix one egg, pumpkin, 1/3 cup sugar, cinnamon, ginger, cloves, and salt. Spread into the pie crust. Use a rubber spatula to spread on the pie crust. Beat the eggs. In another bowl, beat the remaining eggs slightly. Add in the rest of the wet ingredients. Stir in the corn syrup, 2/3 cup sugar, butter, and vanilla. Stir it until well blended. Stir in the pecans. Add the pecans and carefully spoon on top of the pumpkin mixture. Bake. Bake 50 to 60 minutes or until filling is set around edge. Allow the pie to cool completely on a wire rack. Depending on the ambient temperature, this could be up to 5 hours. Enjoy!
